title.jp: Unmei no Deai! Pegasus no Mau Yoru

synopsis:
Chibiusa is in a trance, and is lead to follow a young male voice...suddenly winding up in a crystal forest. Chibiusa meets a white unicorn named Pegasus, and they talk. Usagi wakes her up, and they go out on the town, to hang with Mamoru, Motoki, and Motoki's sister Unazuki. Usagi tries to spook Chibiusa about eclipses, when suddenly a tent appears in the area after the eclipse has taken place. In the tent, we see Madame Zirconia ruling over her Amazon Trio, Hawk Eye, FIsh Eye and Tiger Eye, and they discuss the dream mirrors. Naturally, the target is Unazuki. On a bus, Tigers Eye attacks Unazuki, and the
s hear her shrills and run to her aid. Karakuriko is the lemure used, so Sailor Moon and Sailor Chibimoon fight her off, and save Unazuki's dreams.

title.jp: Super Henshin Futatabi! Pegasus no Power

synopsis: Thanks to the mysterious pegasus, Usagi gains the power of Super Sailor Moon.

title.jp: Mamore Haha no Yume! Double Moon no Shin Hissatsu Waza

synopsis: Usagi has a fight with Chibiusa, Shingo and Ikuko over lemon pie (very Usagi like) and despite Ami and Rei's attempts to calm her, she stays angry. Hawkseye takes his turn, and goes after his new target, Ikuko! Ikuko is with Chibiusa when she is attacked, so Chibiusa fetches Usagi's help. They transform, and try to fight Hawkseye, and his lemure, off but no dice. Pegasus grants Sailor Moon a new attack ""Moon Gorgeous Meditation"", which works like a charm...and Ikuko's dream is saved.

title.jp: Pegasus wo Toraero! Amazon no Wana

synopsis: Usagi and the girls try to help Naru and Umino, when Naru becomes the target of Tigers Eye. She gets trapped into Tigers Eye's cage, but Pegasus helps save her, and her dream is saved. Sailor Moon and the soliders use their attacks, and are able to defeat the lemures.

title.jp: Oniai no Futari! Usagi to Mamoru no AiÂ
Artemis no Uwaki? Nazo no Koneko Toujou

synopsis: When a cat from the future appears to the past, Luna thinks Artemis cheated on her and had a kitten.

title.jp: Makoto no Yuujou! Tenba ni Akogareta Shoujo
Fureau Kokoro! Chibiusa to Pegasas
Mamoru wo Mamore! Ninja Usagi no Yakimochi
Ayakashi no Mori! Utsukushiki Yousei no Izanai
Tengoku Made Hashire! Yume no Kuruma ni Kakeru ai
Mezase Nippon Ichi! Bishoujo Kenshi no Nayami

synopsis: A young ignored warrior girl attempts to pursue her dream as the strongest warrior in Japan, that is until Tigers Eye attempts to destroy her dream mirror.

title.jp: Mini ga Daisuki! Oshare na Senshi-tachi
Koi no Arashi! Minako no Futamata Daisakusen

synopsis: Trouble stirs up when both Tigers Eye and Hawks Eye go after the same dream mirror, Minako's.

title.jp: Himitsu no Yakata! Ai no Menyuu wo Anata ni
Pegasus wo Shinjiru Toki! Yon Senshi no Super Henshin
Kirameku Natsu no hi! Shiokaze no Shoujo Ami
Prima wo Nerae! Usagi no Ballet

synopsis: It's a battle for best ballerina! Who can win? The stunning, beautiful but natural clumsy Usagi or the villionous Fish Eye?

title.jp: Juubangai no Kyuujitsu! Mujaki na Oujo-sama
Unmei no Partner? Makoto no Junjou
Kyoaku no Kage! Oitsumerareta Torio

synopsis: Zirconia gives Fish Eye the photo of a man to attack, and Fish Eye goes after the target. The target is Mamoru.

title.jp: Yume no Kagami! Amazon saigo no Stage

synopsis: Fish Eye is devasted to learn that he will not get to be a human with beautiful dreams anymore after the next full moon. He poses as a female, and wants to be with Mamoru before he gets transported back to a fish. Mamoru is to loyal to Usagi to accept. Fish Eye still wins a kiss. Fish Eye is depressed about not getting his love, and winds up going to Usagi's house to seek shelter from the rain. He is shocked to find out, Usagi is Super Sailor Moon and best of all, Pegasus is in Chibiusa's care. Zirconia is ready to replace the Amazon Trio with the Amazon Quartet, and they send out a demon to berid of Tigers Eye, Hawks Eye and Fish Eye. The remaining 2/3's of the trio come down to Earth, and there they attack Usagi for her mirror. Fish Eye explains his wish of having dreams, and everyone agrees they want to be full human. The Quartet's demon attacks Fish Eye, but Hawks Eye saves him by stepping in the way, and is killed. With the power of Pegasus, the demon is killed but the full moon s

title.jp: Amazoness! Kagami no Ura Kara Kita Akumu
Shin no Power Bakuhatsu! Ami Kokoro no Shirabe
Honou no Jounetsu! Mars Ikari no Chouhissatsu Waza

synopsis: Usagi sees Rei on a cover of a popular magazine and sees that at the shrine she is overly popular. A little girl decides to dress up like Rei and help her. This girl idolizes Rei! Rei tells the other girls that she is annoyed by her, and she is sad and runs away. One of the Amazon Quartet girls takes her dream. Moon and team defeat the youma.

title.jp: Kyoufu no Haishasan? Parapara no YakataÂ

synopsis: Para-para is sent on a job to open a dentist job in order to steal dreams. Usagi and Chibiusa, along with many people, have cavities and go to that dentist. Mamo notices that many people come into the dentist place, but no one comes out. Usagi and Chibiusa are attacked and Mamo as Tuxedo Kamen goes to save them. Para-para is sad to know it has all failed. Ikuko sends the two girls to the Juuban Dentist because theit cavities are real!

title.jp: Yume Taiketsu! Minako to Makoto Zekkou SengenÂ
Kyoufu wo Koete! Jiyuu e no Jump
Yume wo Miushinawanaide! Shinjitsu wo Utsusu KagamiÂ
Pegasus ga Kieta!? Yure Ugoku YuujouÂ
Pegasus no Himitsu! Yume Sekai wo Mamoru BishounenÂ
Chibiusa no Chiisana Koi no RhapsodyÂ
Otona ni Naru Yume! Amazones no Touwaku
Ugoki Dashita Kyoufu! Yami no Joou no MashuÂ
Yami no Shingenchi Dead Moon CircusÂ
Kagami no Meikyuu! Toraerareta Chibi MoonÂ
Golden Crystal Shutsugen! Nehelenia no Maryoku
Kurisutaru Kagayaku Toki! Utsukushiki Yume no ChikaraÂ
Yume yo Itsumademo! Hikari, Ten ni MichiteÂ
